text:
I am using Ant 1.5.4 successfully on Windows 2000 but when I use exactly the 
same process on Windows XP I seem to have a problem with Ant not finding files, 
it seems to be that Ant is not picking up the system classpath.

Thanks in advance

text: Please ask this sort of question on the ant-user mailing list.
